body.name: Bruno Marc Men's Bertram Non Slip Work Shoes, Waterproof Lightweight Work Shoes & Restaurant or Food Service Sneakers
features: Slip-Resistant & Cushioned: The MD midsole blends lightweight design, flexibility, and softness for easy movement. With a rubber outsole, these restaurant shoes deliver durability, slip resistance to oil and water

Responsive & Breathable: Featuring an EVA insole, these shoes offer excellent responsiveness, supporting your feet and ensuring shock absorption. The mesh lining enhances breathability, preventing feet from feeling stuffy or sweaty even during extended wear

Easy To Clean: The vegan leather upper maintains a smart look while being durable and resistant to wear. Plus, they're easy to clean. In work environments like kitchens, where stains and oil splatters may occur

Lightweight To Wear: The lightweight structure ensures comfort during prolonged walking and standing. With slip-resistant and shock-absorbing features, these shoes provide ample support for your feet, whether it's a workday or a day involving extended periods of standing or walking
Perfect Work Shoes: Ideal for those seeking comfort and slip resistance, such as restaurant servers, kitchen staff, and cleaners

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #44,864 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #29 in Men's Health Care & Food Service Shoes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit true to size
reviews.reviewText: These Bruno Marc shoes are comfortable to wear and fit true to size. They are certainly non slip and work well. They are well made and feel like they will hold up under some heavy use. These are a well made, fit for work use lightweight shoe and a good value for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Grip better than my studded snow tires
reviews.reviewText: If you love Skecher shoes, you will love these! They are true to size and the perfect combination of durability, safety and comfort. They are exceptionally light and breathable. They feel almost as comfortable as a slipper, at least on my feet. These are a great pair to wear if you have to be on your feet for long periods of time due to the support they provide. They appear to be well constructed and durable, but of course only time will tell. Skechers feel for better-than-Skechers cost. I certainly recommend these.*********************************** MY RATING SYSTEM ***********************************1 STARProduct either fails to function/perform as intended or described, is significantly lacking in quality and/or represents a very poor value. Product should be avoided.2 STARSProduct lacks either quality or features expected, fails to function/perform as describe/expected, and/or is a below average value. Many better options available.3 STARSProduct functions as described. Good/average quality. Price is reasonable and what you’d expect to pay. On par with other products on the market.4 STARSProduct functions as described with perhaps additional desirable features. Above average quality and preferable to many products on the market. Excellent value.5 STARSProduct exceeds expectations in terms of function/performance, features, quality and/or price. Among the best in my experience on the market.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent comfort and traction
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these for my son who works as a bartender. He said "These shoes are great! They arrived in a box and not a bag so they were well protected. They have good support, they're nice and lightweight, they have great traction and they're really comfy! I'm impressed and I definitely recommend them!"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hubby Likes These
reviews.reviewText: These run true to size. I got them for my husband and he said the following:*They fit well and feel nice.*They have a strong grip on the bottom--definitely non-slip.*They make great work shoes since they are black. This makes them nice for a quick run into the office or all-day working at a restaurant (since they are non-slip).We got them for every day, run into the office, and gentle hiking. They suit our purposes well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great brand, never disappointed
reviews.reviewText: Bruno Mars shoes have always been a great brand for me, and this pair of non-slip shoes did not disappoint. Perfect fit, very comfortable to wear, and the treads are exactly what I expected for non-slip shoes. Definitely a great fit for restaurant and quick service food workers, and a great value for the price.
